titleStmt.title: A strange and terrible sight forseene in this kingdome, and city of London: together with the countrimans antidote for its prevention.
titleStmt.author: J. J.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Ed. Blackmore, and Tho. Banks .. to be sold at the Angell in Pauls Churchyard, .. upon the top of Bridewell-staires,

notesStmt.note: Imprint of microfilm copy is faded, affecting text.
